text:
Rami Said Malek (born May 12, 1981) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Elliot Alderson in the USA Network television series "Mr. Robot". For his role as Alderson, he won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series in 2016.
Malek is also known for his roles in the "Night at the Museum" trilogy, "The Pacific" (2010), ' (2012), and "Short Term 12" (2013).
Malek played musician Freddie Mercury in the biographical drama "Bohemian Rhapsody" (2018). He won a Golden Globe Award and an Oscar for this role in 2019.

annotations.surface_form: Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series
